snippet: Expectations are rising that Bulgarian officials will confirm a link between Hezbollah and a bombing that killed five Israelis in Bulgaria last July.
abstract: Meeting of top Bulgarian government officials and security personnel about bombing in July 2012 that killed five Israeli tourists and Bulgarian bus driver could have wide-reaching repercussions for Europe's uneasy detente with militant group Hezbollah; expectations are rising that officials will confirm link between Hezbollah and bombing, which would force European Union to reconsider whether to designate group a terrorist organization.

byline.original: By NICHOLAS KULISH and MATTHEW BRUNWASSER

lead_paragraph: Expectations are rising that Bulgarian officials will confirm a link between Hezbollah and a bombing that killed five Israelis in Bulgaria last July.

headline.seo: Europe Watching Findings on Bulgaria Bombing for Hezbollah Link
headline.main: Europeans Await Report on Bus Blast in Bulgaria
headline.print_headline: Europeans Await Report On Bus Blast In Bulgaria
